title: Provided that the area equivalent to the market value (as per ASR of that year) of area admissible as per the prescribed percentage of BUA to MHADA can be made available within the same or adjoining municipal ward of MCGM
clause_text: Provided that the area equivalent to the market value (as per ASR of that year) of area admissible as per the prescribed percentage of BUA to MHADA can be made available within the same or adjoining municipal ward of MCGM.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
